data.eml:eml: First records of the genera Chagria and Davmata from China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Erythroneurini), with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cao, Yanghui, Huang, Min, Zhang, Yalin (2011): First records of the genera Chagria and Davmata from China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Erythroneurini), with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 3023: 61-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204605
